snippet: The Montreal Canadiens and their local goalkeeper Mike Condon spoilt New Year's Day for the Boston Bruins, crushing their longtime foes 5-1 in the NHL's annual outdoor Winter Classic in Foxborough, Massachusetts on Friday....
lead_paragraph: The Montreal Canadiens and their local goalkeeper Mike Condon spoilt New Year's Day for the Boston Bruins, crushing their longtime foes 5-1 in the NHL's annual outdoor Winter Classic in Foxborough, Massachusetts on Friday.

headline.main: Canadiens Spoil Boston's Outdoor Party in 5-1 Rout
headline.print_headline: Canadiens Spoil Boston's Outdoor Party in 5-1 Rout
